verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just want to love I just want to sing
to the one above who has touched this thirsty soul
(repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll always love you I'll always sing to you Jesus
I long to worship you in spirit and in truth
(repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Every day I'll come spend my life with you
learning of your heart and what your calling me to do
